title: WiBit.Net Video Tutorial - Keystroke Logger Deployment on Window
description:
/* ************************************************************************** */
/* ************************ WiBit.Net Video Tutorial ************************ */
/* ************************************************************************** */
Title          : Keystroke Logger Deployment on Windows Vista
Num Videos     : 7
Lesson Length  : ??
Resolution     : 800 x 600
Codec Download : http://www.techsmith.com/download/codecs.asp
Date Recorded  : 11/30/2006
Narrator(s)    : 
OS:            : Microsoft Windows Vists RC2, BartsPE
Software       : 
Description    : The following tutorial videos were originally created for a 
                 presentation on Windows Vista Security for Operating System 
                 Security (Fall 2006) at Towson University. The software and 
                 presentation was created by Kevin Willett and Ryan Chite as 
                 a class project. Learn how to deploy a keystroke logger on 
                 the Microsoft Windows Vista platform using a Live Windows CD. 
                 The keystroke logger is created in a previous WiBit.Net 
                 tutorial, so before watching this series be sure you create 
                 the keylogger first. The deploy software isnÃƒÂ¢??t coded live on 
                 this tutorial. The flow chart is available, however, so feel 
                 free to create your own version. Enjoy!
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-= Video List -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
Video 1        : Introduction
Video 2        : Download BartPE
Video 3        : Create Windows Live ISO
Video 4        : Add Logger to ISO
Video 5        : Deploy Keylogger
Video 6        : Wait for User to Login
Video 7        : Retrieve Key Log
/* ************************************************************************** */
/* ***************************** About WiBit.Net **************************** */
/* ************************************************************************** */
WiBit was a website used by college students (and one professor) from Towson 
University in Baltimore, Maryland as a repository for learning materials. The
site creators were former Computer Science and Computer Security students, 
Kevin Willett and Bryan Stouffer. The first WiBit Tutorials were created by 
Kevin as a study aid for himself in late 2003. Over the following years Kevin
and Bryan decided to create a few tutorials and give themselves and their
fellow students a place to view and use them. Some were used as presentation
aids and students teaching students seminars. Over 30 tutorials were created!
The WiBit Tutorials served themselves well! All the students involved in the
project became professionals in their field of study. The creators Kevin and 
Bryan currently develop medical software. Others are working for great 
companies such as Bowing and Lockheed Martin. Since college the need to 
create tutorials has died down, but who knows what the future holds!
